06:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5212/AR5213 Wireless Network Adapter [168c:0013] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: PROXIM Inc Device [14b7:aa10]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
===ath5k chip info dump=== 
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x60
ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
ath: Country alpha2 being used: 00
ath: Regpair used: 0x60
ath5k: phy22: Atheros AR5212 chip found (MAC: 0x56, PHY: 0x41)
ath5k: phy22: RF5111 5GHz radio found (0x17)
ath5k: phy22: RF2111 2GHz radio found (0x23)
